name: Crystal Caves: lost diamonds
description:
Crystal Caves is a unique and colorful world, accessible for study by you! Move the crystals three in a row, open all the secrets of dwarves and gnomes and get all their riches and treasures! Use combinations to apply magic and spells that stagger your imagination with your effects.

Crystal Caves has many features:
- colorful effects and animations;
- magic and spells;
- more than 200 levels;
- 20 different locations;
- unique tasks and mini-games;
- various achievements;
- Free bonuses every 10 minutes!

If you like our game, please leave a good review!
